verses.verse: And Moses <S%H4872><s%> assembled <S%H6950><s%> all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and <S%H6950><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H1697><s%>, These are the words which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath commanded <S%H6680><s%>, that ye should do them <S%H6213><s%>.

Six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> shall work <S%H4399><s%> be done <S%H6213><s%>; but on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> there shall be to you a holy day <S%H6944><s%>, a sabbath <S%H7676><s%> of solemn rest <S%H7677><s%> to Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: whosoever doeth <S%H6213><s%> any work <S%H4399><s%> therein shall be put to death <S%H4191><s%>.
Ye shall kindle <S%H1197><s%> no fire <S%H784><s%> throughout your habitations <S%H4186><s%> upon the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> spake <S%H559><s%> unto all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, This is the thing <S%H1697><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Take <S%H3947><s%> ye from among you an offering <S%H8641><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; whosoever <S%H3605><s%> is of a willing <S%H5081><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%>, let him bring <S%H935><s%> it <S%H3068><s%>, Jehovah's offering <S%H8641><s%>: gold <S%H2091><s%>, and silver <S%H3701><s%>, and brass <S%H5178><s%>,
and blue <S%H8504><s%>, and purple <S%H713><s%>, and scarlet <S%H8144><s%>, and fine linen <S%H8336><s%>, and goats <S%H5795><s%>' hair,
and rams <S%H352><s%>' skins <S%H5785><s%> dyed red <S%H119><s%>, and <S%H5785><s%> sealskins <S%H8476><s%>, and acacia <S%H7848><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%>,
and oil <S%H8081><s%> for the light <S%H3974><s%>, and spices <S%H1314><s%> for the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%>, and for the sweet <S%H5561><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%>,
and onyx <S%H7718><s%> stones <S%H68><s%>, and stones <S%H68><s%> to be set <S%H4394><s%>, for the ephod <S%H646><s%>, and for the breastplate <S%H2833><s%>.
And let every <S%H3820><s%> wise-hearted <S%H2450><s%> man among you come <S%H935><s%>, and make <S%H6213><s%> all that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath commanded <S%H6680><s%>:

the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>, its tent <S%H168><s%>, and its covering <S%H4372><s%>, its clasps <S%H7165><s%>, and its boards <S%H7175><s%>, its bars <S%H1280><s%>, its pillars <S%H5982><s%>, and its sockets <S%H134><s%>;
the ark <S%H727><s%>, and the staves <S%H905><s%> thereof <S%H3727><s%>, the mercy-seat, and the veil <S%H6532><s%> of the screen <S%H4539><s%>;
the table <S%H7979><s%>, and its staves <S%H905><s%>, and all its vessels <S%H3627><s%>, and the showbread <S%H6440><s%>;
the candlestick <S%H4501><s%> also for the light <S%H3974><s%>, and its vessels <S%H3627><s%>, and its lamps <S%H5216><s%>, and the oil <S%H8081><s%> for the light <S%H3974><s%>;

and the altar <S%H4196><s%> of incense <S%H7004><s%>, and its staves <S%H905><s%>, and the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%>, and the sweet <S%H5561><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%>, and the screen <S%H4539><s%> for the door <S%H6607><s%>, at the door of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>;

the altar <S%H4196><s%> of burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>, with its grating <S%H4345><s%> of brass <S%H5178><s%>, it staves <S%H905><s%>, and all its vessels <S%H3627><s%>, the laver <S%H3595><s%> and its base <S%H3653><s%>;

the hangings <S%H7050><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%>, the pillars <S%H5982><s%> thereof <S%H134><s%>, and their sockets, and the screen <S%H4539><s%> for the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%>;
the pins <S%H3489><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>, and the pins <S%H3489><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%>, and their cords <S%H4340><s%>;

the finely wrought garments <S%H899><s%>, for ministering <S%H8278><s%> in the holy <S%H6944><s%> place <S%H6944><s%>, the holy garments <S%H899><s%> for Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>, and the garments <S%H899><s%> of his sons <S%H1121><s%>, to minister in the priest <S%H3547><s%>'s office.
And all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> departed <S%H3318><s%> from the presence <S%H6440><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

And they came <S%H935><s%>, every one <S%H376><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> stirred him up <S%H5375><s%>, and every one whom his spirit <S%H7307><s%> made willing <S%H5068><s%>, and brought <S%H935><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>'s offering <S%H8641><s%>, for the work <S%H4399><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>, and for all the service <S%H5656><s%> thereof <S%H6944><s%>, and for the holy garments <S%H899><s%>.

And they came <S%H935><s%>, both <S%H5921><s%> men <S%H582><s%> and women <S%H802><s%>, as many as <S%H3605><s%> were <S%H5081><s%> willing-hearted <S%H3820><s%>, and brought <S%H935><s%> brooches <S%H2397><s%>, and ear-rings <S%H5141><s%>, and signet-rings <S%H2885><s%>, and armlets <S%H3558><s%>, all jewels <S%H3627><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>; even every man <S%H376><s%> that offered <S%H5130><s%> an offering <S%H8573><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And every man <S%H376><s%>, with whom was found <S%H4672><s%> blue <S%H8504><s%>, and purple <S%H713><s%>, and scarlet <S%H8144><s%>, and fine linen <S%H8336><s%>, and goats <S%H5795><s%>' hair <S%H352><s%>, and rams' skins <S%H5785><s%> dyed red <S%H119><s%>, and <S%H5785><s%> sealskins <S%H8476><s%>, brought them <S%H935><s%>.

Every one that did offer <S%H7311><s%> an offering <S%H8641><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%> and brass <S%H5178><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>'s offering <S%H8641><s%>; and every man <S%H4672><s%>, with whom was found acacia <S%H7848><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%> for any work <S%H4399><s%> of the service <S%H5656><s%>, brought it <S%H935><s%>.

And all the women <S%H802><s%> that were <S%H2450><s%> wise-hearted <S%H3820><s%> did spin <S%H2901><s%> with their hands <S%H3027><s%>, and brought <S%H935><s%> that which they had spun <S%H4299><s%>, the blue <S%H8504><s%>, and the purple <S%H713><s%>, the scarlet <S%H8144><s%>, and the fine linen <S%H8336><s%>.
And all the women <S%H802><s%> whose heart <S%H3820><s%> stirred <S%H5375><s%> them up in wisdom <S%H2451><s%> spun <S%H2901><s%> the goats <S%H5795><s%>' hair.

And the rulers <S%H5387><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> the onyx <S%H7718><s%> stones <S%H68><s%>, and the stones <S%H68><s%> to be set <S%H4394><s%>, for the ephod <S%H646><s%>, and for the breastplate <S%H2833><s%>;
and the spice <S%H1314><s%>, and the oil <S%H8081><s%>; for the light <S%H3974><s%>, and for the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%>, and for the sweet <S%H5561><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%>.

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> a freewill-offering <S%H5071><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; every man <S%H376><s%> and woman <S%H802><s%>, whose <S%H834><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> made them willing <S%H5068><s%> to bring <S%H935><s%> for all the work <S%H4399><s%>, which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> to be made <S%H6213><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, See <S%H7200><s%>, Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath called <S%H7121><s%> by name <S%H8034><s%> Bezalel <S%H1212><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Uri <S%H221><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hur <S%H2354><s%>, of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>;

and he hath filled <S%H4390><s%> him with the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, in wisdom <S%H2451><s%>, in understanding <S%H8394><s%>, and in knowledge <S%H1847><s%>, and in all manner of workmanship <S%H4399><s%>;
and to devise <S%H2803><s%> skilful works <S%H4284><s%>, to work <S%H6213><s%> in gold <S%H2091><s%>, and in silver <S%H3701><s%>, and in brass <S%H5178><s%>,

and in cutting <S%H2799><s%> of stones <S%H68><s%> for setting <S%H4390><s%>, and in carving <S%H2799><s%> of wood <S%H6086><s%>, to work <S%H6213><s%> in all manner of skilful <S%H4284><s%> workmanship <S%H4399><s%>.

And he hath put <S%H5414><s%> in his heart <S%H3820><s%> that he may teach <S%H3384><s%>, both he <S%H171><s%>, and Oholiab, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahisamach <S%H294><s%>, of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%>.

Them hath he filled <S%H4390><s%> with wisdom <S%H2451><s%> of heart <S%H3820><s%>, to work <S%H6213><s%> all manner of workmanship <S%H4399><s%>, of the engraver <S%H2796><s%>, and of the skilful workman <S%H2803><s%>, and of the embroiderer <S%H7551><s%>, in blue <S%H8504><s%>, and in purple <S%H713><s%>, in scarlet <S%H8144><s%>, and in fine linen <S%H8336><s%>, and of the weaver <S%H707><s%>, even of them that do <S%H6213><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> workmanship <S%H4399><s%>, and of those that devise <S%H2803><s%> skilful works <S%H4284><s%>.
